name: Nacional
description: Riffing on the classic Hotel Nacional cocktail, which uses apricot brandy for a touch of fruity sweetness, Morgenthaler introduced Fee Brothers Peach Bitters to the mix--and it raises the refreshment bar while tossing in another layer of flavor complexity.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce apricot brandy (Rothman & Winter Orchard Apricot is a good choice)
3/4 ounce simple syrup (or less, to taste)
2 good dashes of Fee Brothers Peach Bitters

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.
